# Read strace

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  error = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  echo = FALSE
)
```


```{r}
root <-
  gsub(pattern = "^.+/|\\.R$|\\.qmd$|\\.Rmd$",
       replacement = "",
       x = script)

strace_discards <-
  c("/lib",
    "/etc",
    "/lib64",
    "/usr",
    "/var",
    "/opt",
    "/sys" ,
    "/proc",
    "/tmp",
    "/.$")

data_strace <-
  whirl::read_strace(paste0(root, ".strace"), strace_discards = strace_discards) |> dplyr::tibble()

file_actions <- whirl::refine_strace(data_strace)

input_files <- file_actions$input |>
  dplyr::select("file", "duration", "time")

output_files <- file_actions$output |>
  dplyr::select("file", "duration", "time")
```

```{r}
# Print input_files to the log
  input_files  |>
    knitr::kable(caption = "Input Files") |>
    knitr::knit_print()
```

```{r}
# Print output_files to the log
  output_files  |>
    knitr::kable(caption = "Ouput Files") |>
    knitr::knit_print()
```
